task.title: Preparing the Land and Planting Seeds
task.shortdesc: Once you have acquired your seeds, you will need to prepare the land for planting to grow the crops.

taskbody.prereq:
You need the following tools to complete this task:
axe
hoe
pickaxe
scythe
watering can

step.cmd: Right click with the appropriate tool to clear any obstacles from the land.
Use the arrow keys to aim your character at the square you wish to till. Right click to till the land.
step.stepresult: The tilled land will darken slightly and a digging sound effect will play.

step.cmd: Repeat until you have tilled one square per seed you want to plant.
Equip the seeds of the crop you wish to plant.
Right click on the tilled square where you want to plant the seed.
step.stepresult: Scatter seeds should appear on the tilled dirt, and you should no longer be able to plant on top of those seeds.

step.cmd: Repeat until you have planted all your seeds.
